title: (x) Serif from John Cage book, 1967 - Booklman {Raph}
content:
Any ideas what this might be?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203152854im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/cage_5078.png)

 [‹ (x) NC Academy of Dance Arts serif italic w/ swash caps - Monotype Garamond {Stéphane Darricau}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203152854/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38749 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) De Argentina classic serif caps - Felix Titling {Lex} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203152854/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38743 "Go to next forum topic")
author: JLM

comments.content:
That’s what I thought, but it wasn’t looking like such a good match. I’ll try some other cuts.

j

Bookman. Not the later ITC version, but the original metal. [Bitstream Bookman](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203152854/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/bookman/) is the digitization that looks like the closest match.
